mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MENTORING ORDER BY MENTORING_NUMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENTORING ( MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTOR_ID, MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTORING_END_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MENTORING.NEXTVAL, #{mentoring_name}, #{mentoring_limit}, #{mentoring_content}, #{mentoring_photo}, #{mentoring_price}, #{mentor_id}, #{mentoring_begin_date}, #{mentoring_end_date} )
mapper.select: SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as s_date, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as e_date FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTOR_ID = #{mentor_id}

SELECT
TO_CHAR(MEN_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "men_start", TO_CHAR(MET_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "met_end", ID, MENTEEID FROM MYMENTORINGVU WHERE MENTORING_NUMBER=#{mentoring_number}

SELECT I.MENTORING_NUMBER, I.MENTORING_NAME, I.MENTORING_LIMIT, I.MENTORING_CONTENT, I.MENTORING_PHOTO, I.MENTORING_PRICE, I.MENTORING_DATA, I.MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(I.MENTORING_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "mentoring_end_date", TO_CHAR(I.MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "mentoring_begin_date", M.ID FROM MENTORING I
JOIN MENTOR M ON I.MENTOR_ID=M.MENTOR_ID WHERE ID=#{id}
select MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, MENTORING_END_DATE FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE = #{mentoring_begin_date}

SELECT MENTORING_NUMBER, MENTORING_NAME, MENTORING_LIMIT, MENTORING_CONTENT, MENTORING_PHOTO, MENTORING_PRICE, MENTORING_DATA, MENTOR_ID, TO_CHAR(MENTORING_BEGIN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "mentoring_begin_date", TO_CHAR(MENTORING_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "mentoring_end_date", MENTORING_CLICK, MENTORING_OPEN_DATE FROM MENTORING WHERE MENTORING_NUMBER = #{mentoring_number}
